summary:
Kiss was an American rock band formed in 1973. They became famous for their wild live shows with fire and special effects. The original members were Paul Stanley, Gene Simmons, Ace Frehley, and Peter Criss. They wore makeup and costumes, each with a unique character.

In the 1980s, they stopped wearing makeup and got new members. The band's popularity grew again. Later, the original members reunited, and they went on a very successful tour. Kiss continued to change members and perform until their final show in 2023. They are known as one of the most influential and best-selling rock bands.
title: Kiss (band)
